content: insert 9mm safety eyes between rounds 10-11 3 stitches apart 22-24 single_crochet x 48 48 25 single_crochet x 4 decrease x 8 40 stuff and continue stuffing until you fasten_off 26 single_crochet x 3 decrease x 8 32 27 single_crochet x 2 decrease x 8 24 28 single_crochet decrease x 8 16 29 decrease x 8 8 finishing fasten_off weave tail through final round and pull to close weave end wings notes use yellow make 2 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase x 6 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 4-5 single_crochet x 18 18 6 single_crochet x 4 decrease x 3 15 7 single_crochet x 3 decrease x 3 12 finishing fold single_crochet x 6 across top to close fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2025 cheeks notes use hot pink make 2 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 finishing slip_stitch to close fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing comb notes use red 1 ch7 starting in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet double_crochet ch1 double_crochet single_crochet in same st slip_stitch 3 times finishing fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing bow notes use red 1 ch15 slip_stitch to initial chain to form a circle 15 2-3 ch2 and double_crochet in the same stitch double_crochet x 14 slip_stitch to initial double_crochet to close the round 15 finishing with a long tail and wrap around the middle to form a bow i have wrapped around 6 times and then tied to the initial tail to secure © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2025 assembly 1 comb sew to the top of the head from round 3 at the front to round 3 at the back 2 nose using orange embroider a v over rounds 12-13 of the head between the safety eyes 3 sts wide over round 12 and down to 1 st at round 13 3 bow sew to the front of the head over rounds 17-19 4 cheeks sew to the head over rounds 13-15 on the outer side of each safety eye 5 wings sew to either side of the head over rounds 18-19 approx 3 stitches from the bow © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2025 you re all done © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2025
